heroSection.title: Stuck from Learning through Online Videos?
heroSection.subtitle: With Veenotes you will be able to learn from video content more effective and way faster.

features.title: Enhanced Focus
features.description: Focus on the key moments that matter, reducing distractions and improving learning efficiency.

features.title: Time Saving
features.description: Quickly access important sections without rewatching entire videos, making your learning faster and more efficient.

features.title: Improved Retention
features.description: Reinforce learning by revisiting key points with personalized notes, helping you retain important information longer.
